instructions: In the Notes app on your Mac, click the note or folder you want to add people to. Note: You can t add people to a locked note, a folder with any locked notes, a note that has been shared with you, or a folder that contains a note that has been shared with you. Click the Add People button in the toolbar. Do one of the following: To add people to just the note: Choose Note. To add people to the folder: Choose Folder. You can also click the More button next to the folder in the sidebar, then choose Add People. Select a method (such as Mail or AirDrop) for sending the invitation. If you selected a method which requires it, add recipients by doing one of the following: Type a name, email address, or phone number for each recipient. Click the Add button to select someone from Contacts. From the Permission pop-up menu, choose to allow the people you invite to be able to view the note or folder of notes only, or make changes to the note or folder of notes. Click Share. If you re adding people using Mail or Messages, enter the recipients after you click Share, then click Send.

To open the note, do one of the following: If you added people to the note: Select the note in the Notes app on your Mac or on iCloud.com . If you were added to the note by someone else: Click the link you received, then click Open. Note: For security, you can open the note only if the email address or phone number used to send you the invitation is associated with your Apple ID. If it isn t, you re asked to add it. See Verify your email address or phone number to open a shared item . Once you open the note, it remains in your list of notes. Edit the note. All participants who have the note open can see the changes you and others make in near real time. Highlights appear as a participant makes a change. If you don t have a note open when someone makes a change to it, a small yellow dot appears to the left of the note in the notes list or gallery view.
Tap Radio, then tap a genre listed below Radio by Genre. Tap a featured station.
Touch and hold an artist or song. Tap Create Station.
